channel.title: New Era Gaming
channel.description:
http://new-era.ucoz.com - Website http://new-era.ucoz.com/index/play_now/0-6 - Play Now
Login PK and Skilling Server! Join and check it out! Friendly Staff. Always trying to do players suggestions and requests. Will Add PICTURES later.
Features
*Stable economy *Many shops *Dicing *Clue scrolls *Perfect PK *Revs *Godwars Dungeon *KBD *Dags *Chaos Ele And Corp Beast *Choose Sarter Pure, Main, Zerk, Skiller, Ranger + Combat Stats *PK as you login *Many Minigames including Castlewars *Skilling *Full Screen (only in desktop client.) [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img401/7089/vf5.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img835/6511/ce6p.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img547/310/dbj.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img849/3756/yn9.png[/img]
